english.segment1: Now that we're here. Here in your presence. Humbly we bow. Speak to us now. Now that we're here. Here in your presence. We're waiting to hear from you. We're open. We're open. We're open. Speak to us now
english.segment3: Give us your heart. Your heart for the nations. for this generation. Give us your heart. Give us your heart. For the wounded and the broken. For the widow and the orphan.
